bibl.title: How Stesichorus Began His Sack of Troy.
bibl.note: Revised version of a paper delivered before audiences in Thessaloniki, Nottingham, Oxford, and Birmingham. - 1. Papyrus [P. Oxy. XXXII, 2619 (= M.-P.3 1485.3; LDAB 3973)]. - 2. Quotation. - 3. Location. - 4. Text. - 5. The eclipse of Odysseus. - 6. The lowly water-carrier. - 7. The pity of Athena. - 8. Conclusion. - 9. Appendix [reconstruction, purely exempli gratia, of what the opening of the poem could have looked like]. - 10. Bibliography.
bibl.seg: Patrick J. Finglass, How Stesichorus Began His Sack of Troy.
